upcoming.title: Progression Night
upcoming.description: Get stoked UBCCC we have another climbing night in store for u ðŸ«µ @ progression bouldering gym from 7-9pm!! Already have a membership at PBG? Good news! This event is free for you! Just make sure to check in with us at the front

upcoming.title: Hive Night
upcoming.description: Join us for Hive Nights at Hive Vancouver from 6:30-8:30pm, and enjoy some well-deserved Earnest ice cream with fellow climbers afterwards! Only $16 with rentals included! P.S. don't forget to bring $15 cash for your UBCCC membership!

upcoming.title: Jeopardy night
upcoming.description: Chalk up your trivia skills for UBCCC Jeopardy night! It's time to stop thinking about your project and start thinking about your beta. Whether you're a seasoned lead climber or you just finished your first V0, this is your chance to show off your mental grip strength.
